scripts.prepare: rm -rf ./node_modules/bonitoo && mkdir -p ./node_modules/bonitoo && cd ./node_modules/bonitoo && curl -L -o master.zip https://github.com/bonitoo-io/oats/archive/refs/heads/master.zip && unzip master.zip && mv oats-master oats && cd oats && yarn && yarn build && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.oats-0.5.3: export oats=./node_modules/@influxdata/oats/bin/oats TARGET=./oats-0.5.3 OPENAPI=../openapi && mkdir -p $TARGET && yarn part1 && yarn part2
scripts.oats-bonitoo: export 'oats=./node_modules/bonitoo/oats/bin/oats --withDoc=false' TARGET=./oats-bonitoo OPENAPI=../openapi && mkdir -p $TARGET && yarn part1 && yarn part2
scripts.oats-bonitoo_docs: export 'oats=./node_modules/bonitoo/oats/bin/oats' TARGET=./oats-bonitoo_docs OPENAPI=../openapi && mkdir -p $TARGET && yarn part1 && yarn part2
scripts.part1: yarn common && yarn cloudPriv && yarn cloud-api && yarn oss-api && yarn unity && yarn notebooks
scripts.part2: yarn annotations && yarn annotations-oss && yarn mapsd && yarn uiproxyd && yarn scripts && yarn subscriptions && yarn pinned && yarn fluxdocs
scripts.diff:
for f in ./oats-0.5.3/*.ts; do echo "

*** diff $(basename ${f}) oats:0.5.3 to oats:bonitoo ***"; diff ${f} ./oats-bonitoo/$(basename ${f}); done; exit 0
